title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.
a. Multiple selection could be enabled.
c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as (default) (see perspectives).
NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:
f. Need a width hint for the dialog.
g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?
I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.
KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
released fixes for a, c, f, g.
OB: When pressing 'Add' button in the associated editors section, it adds a hidden entry.
EB:
When pressing 'Add' button in the associated editors section, it should not add a hidden entry.

Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Go to the associated editors section.
3. Press the 'Add' button.

Observe that a hidden entry is added.

Expected behavior: When pressing the 'Add' button, no hidden entry should be added.

4. Check the list of associated editors.

Observe that entries which are already existing in the associated editors list are available for selection.

Expected behavior: Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
